allow: Bash(pwsh.exe -Command "conda activate py310_env; pip install pyinstaller")
Bash(pwsh.exe -Command "conda activate py310_env; pyinstaller --onefile --windowed --icon=assets/icon.ico --name=''老王下载器'' main.py")
Bash(pwsh.exe -Command "conda activate py310_env; conda remove -y pathlib")
Bash(pwsh.exe -Command "conda activate py310_env; pip uninstall -y pathlib")
